title: Buttons randomly reset completely to default.
body:
On one of my accounts I think the server "forgot" my persistedsettings.json? ALL my settings, including buttons, sounds, etc, were reset to default.

I had to fix it by:

1) Copying one of my backups of my persistedsettings.json into my config folder.

2) Changing a button and then changing it back so the server would save it.

But why did this even happen? The file was saved on the server before.

Is this issue still happening for anyone?  I see a few posts reporting similar situations.  I don't have any details on this, so let me know.  For example, does it reset every game or was it just that one instance?  Does resetting your config file to force a server re-sync solve this?  

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

As an aside, when DOES the server re-sync? Sometimes I need to change a couple buttons around to force a re-sync (eg: swapping 2 and 3 and then swapping them back to get the server to re-sync my backup settings file I had copied to the folder).

But other times the server re-syncs automatically. eg: when I was forcing all 3 of my accounts to have the same settings file, I just copied the one I wanted to the folder, denied write-access so League couldn't over-write it, and then logged into a custom on all 3 accounts and the server seemed to update all 3 with the file. (I re-enabled write-access and tested it afterward and the server-side file was updated).

As an update, it looks like there was an issue overnight that was also posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  As a result, some players might find that their local settings were reset.  It's a crappy situation for those who may need to rebind, and at this point everything should be fine now. 

If your options are still being reset each game, [manually reset your settings](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qkxye0H2-buttons-randomly-reset-completely-to-default?comment=0005) to force a re-sync to the server.  Your settings may also reset if you are using any third party programs that recently patched.

Thanks all for the reports and helping out!

Hmm, I would probably try seeing if you can get the client to upload your settings, something like -> go into a custom game change a setting and click okay. alt-tab out to your Riot Games\League of Legends\Config folder and see if the file has been created. If so, edit it there and save it, then exit the game and client (If it's not there, try creating it just paste those settings into a new notepad file save and name it as persistedsettings.json) and do the exit thing.  I'm not sure when the client determines to re-upload settings changes, but I would imagine it's after exiting a game or exiting the client completely.

Hmm interesting, guess there may be something amiss if it's happened to a few people. Like Charlie, I have the attack-move-click bound to my left mouse button and then numerous other changes to allow me to click in store and what not, those all disappeared along with my keybindings for leveling skills and stuff. I was worried that the persisted settings would be overwritten on the server, so when game ended, I didn't leave game and deleted my persistedsettings.json file (in case it saves at end of game). After deleting that and re-logging, it replaced my persistedsettings.json which had my settings back thankfully, so it hadn't been overwritten on the server (though the copy I deleted locally had been altered). So apparently it's a weird client-side issue of some sort since I got my settings back from the server.
